subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] get your news in QS!
msgSnippet: ... You mean larger margins and a smaller width for the text? That is easy to do. Also formatting it in two columns should be easy to do, I think. It depends
messageBody:
oliver langan wrote:
>
>
> I just realized that the PDF format makes it possible to read
> QuickScript on the iPhone, a first!
>
>
> Is there any way to make the page margins and column width a bit
> smaller, so that the default size/zoom is a bit better on my personal
> toy of choice? :)
>

You mean larger margins and a smaller width for the text? That is easy
to do. Also formatting it in two columns should be easy to do, I think.
It depends on what others want.

Paul
